response.overview: Enter the mind, heart, and musical life of Hal Walker, a beloved TikTok-famous musician living with severe ME/CFS (myalgic encephalomyelitis/chronic fatigue syndrome). Despite a sudden onset of strange neurological symptoms in his twenties that stifled his big-city musical dreams, Hal carved out a career as a folk singer, multi-instrumentalist and music educator in his charming hometown of Kent, Ohio. After an inexplicable downturn of mysterious symptoms in 2021, Halâ€™s music life was shuttered to the confines of his home. Within these limitations, he traverses through his complicated past as a son of a preacher, an addict and a divorced father to his only daughter, Hallie. An honest portrait of a flawed person with extraordinary talent, Living in a Body is a rare humanization of a man trying to survive an impossible circumstance where every action, every feeling has permanent, devastating consequences.
response.title: Living in a Body
